import bs4

# Function to scrape search engine results for a given query
def scrape_search_results(query):
    # Use requests library to get search results
    results = requests.get("https://www.google.com/search?q=" + query)

    # Parse HTML content using BeautifulSoup library
    soup = bs4. BeautifulSoup(results.text, "html.parser")

    # Extract results from HTML elements
    results_data = pd.DataFrame({"Title": [], "URL": [], "Content": []})

    # Iterate over results and add data to DataFrame
    for result in soup.find_all("div", class_="ZINbbc xpd O9g5cc"):
        title = result.find("h3").text
        url = result.find("a")["href"]
        content = result.find("div", class_="ZINbbc xpd O9g5cc").text

        results_data.loc[len(results_data)] = pd.Series({"Title": title, "URL": url, "Content": content})

    # Return DataFrame with results
